na_skill.name: Magma Ball
na_skill.raw_description: Inflicts 20,000 Fire Att. damage on all enemies; changes Dark Orbs to Fire Orbs

en_as_text: Deal 20000 Fire damage to all enemies; Change Dark orbs to Fire orbs
en_ls_text: Reduce damage taken from fire att. by 55%

behavior._name: ※自分のレベルが ai 以上の時 rnd に分岐
※ai フラグが立っていたら rnd の数値に分岐
※フラグを ai にセット

params: 10ターンの間、火属性攻撃を吸収
Absorbs Fire Att. attacks for 10 turns
少しの間、火ドロップが落ちやすくなった
잠시 동안 불드롭의 출현 확률이 높아진다

Fire Orbs more likely to appear 
for a number of turns
